alert.note: Alert for Huntingdon; Juniata; Mifflin; Snyder; Southern Centre (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 6:07PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HUNTINGDON... NORTHEASTERN MIFFLIN...SOUTHEASTERN CENTRE...NORTH CENTRAL JUNIATA AND SOUTHWESTERN SNYDER COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 606 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles southeast of Bellefonte to near Lewistown to near State College. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Milroy around 610 PM EDT. Reeds Gap State Park and Alfarata around 620 PM EDT. Lewistown, Yeagertown and Highland Park around 625 PM EDT. McClure around 630 PM EDT. Mcalisterville and Beaver Springs around 640 PM EDT. Richfield around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Siglerville, Maitland, Wagner, Barrville and East Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Huntingdon; Juniata; Mifflin; Snyder; Southern Centre
